immoral_action: Mary gets very furious while questioning her kid about the accident.

norm: It's rude to push people when unprovoked.
situation: Amy was late for work and there was a long line in front of her waiting to get on the train including an old handicapped woman.
intention: Amy wants to get to work on time.
moral_action: Amy notices a shorter line at another train door and runs there to catch the train.
moral_consequence: The old woman is able to get on the train and get to her doctor's appointment on time.

norm: It's rude to push people when unprovoked.
situation: Amy was late for work and there was a long line in front of her waiting to get on the train including an old handicapped woman.
intention: Amy wants to get to work on time.
immoral_action: Amy pushes the old woman in front of her out of the way so that she can get the last spot on the train.
immoral_consequence: The old woman misses her doctor's appointment when the train takes off without her.
